DOC.brief_summary: This study follow double blind randomize control study design enroll 20 apparently healthy 6 year old child . The child feed two different nutrient fortify oat drink label stable isotope iron ( Fe-57 Fe-58 NaFeEDTA ) . Fourteen day consumption meal Day 2 , blood drawn child stable isotope measurement iron absorption calculate .
DOC.criteria: 6 year old child ( inclusive ) Normal BMI age ( WHO standard : 15.315.5 kg ) Apparently healthy , metabolic gastrointestinal disorder ; nonanemic ( Hemoglobin value less 11.5 mg/dL WHO cutoff respective age ) No medication vitamin/mineral supplement consume study ; intake vitamin/mineral supplement discontinue 2 week start study Parents demonstrate understand give information ability comply study procedure Obtained parental legal representative 's informed consent Known gastrointestinal metabolic disorder experience blood loss past 6 month ; Children take medication Children anemic ( Hemoglobin value less 11.5 mg/dL WHO cutoff value age ) Currently participate participate another clinical trial past 3 month prior begin study
